description: This file contains the definition of a Data Access Object (DAO) interface for performing CRUD operations on 'Note' entities in a Room database, including queries for retrieving all notes, retrieving by ID, and methods for inserting, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Data Access Object interface defining CRUD operations for the 'Note' entity in the Room database.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by descending ID as LiveData.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID as LiveData.

methods.name: getByIdOnce
methods.description: Suspending function to fetch a note by ID once without LiveData.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns its generated ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note from the database.
